===========================
Client Runtime (Proposal A)
===========================

In this document you can find which is the Client Runtime structure provided by RAIN. Any application can interact with it on the client side.

--------
Overview
--------

.. image:: ../images/proposals/client_runtime.jpeg

In the diagram above you can see how Client Runtime is structured. The following components has been identified:

   - Registry 
   - Loader
   - Data store :doc:`/proposals/Features-proposal-client-storage`
   - Messaging
   - Language

For each of these layers proposals are being written.
